snippet.title: Evelyn's Adventure | Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Evelyn's Adventure is a video game where you control Evelyn, a girl who will have to join a thief named Moon Mask to travel through a world full of dangers and surprises to become strong enough to win the knight tournament that will allow her to marry the princess Saraya and use the royal family's fortune to pay for the medicine that will save her mother's life.

This trailer only summarizes the content that is currently in the game demo. For the final version there will be much more content.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/EvelynAdventure
